title: Greek National Water Company - Water Management System - Channel
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic channel (reach) made for raw-water supply management domain. This entity is primarily associated with the water management vertical and related IoT applications.

geometry.description: Description of the geometry of a channel. Text defining the geometry of a channel. Values restricted to 'Trapezoidal' (for open channels) or 'Circular' (for pressurized flow).

bottomSlope.description: The bottom slope of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code
The bottom slope of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

leftSideSlope.description: The slope of the left bank of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

rightSideSlope.description: The slope of the right bank of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

bottomWidth.description: The bottom width of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

maxWaterDepth.description: The maximum allowable water depth of the channel in the case of 'Trapezoidal' type. All units are accepted in CEFACT code

roughness.description: The roughness coefficient of the channel. Manningâ€™s coefficient for open channel flows or Surface roughness k for pipe flows

flowType.description: Text defining the type of flow in the channel. Values restricted to 'free surface flow' or 'pressure-driven flow' or 'flow with steep controls'

celerity.description: velocity of a surge propagated along the channel after the opening or close of a sluice gate

timeTravel.description: the time travel of a surge from the downstream sluice gate to the upstream one

waterLoss.description: water leakages/losses - a flow number or a percentage of flow

length.description: : The length of the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code
